details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.21 Fonts - 7.21.5 Font metrics - Font metrics
details.description: For every font embedded in a conforming file and used for rendering, the glyph width information in the font dictionary and in the embedded font program shall be consistent.

rule.description: For every font embedded in a conforming file and used for rendering, the glyph width information in the font dictionary and in the embedded font program shall be consistent.

error.message: Glyph width information in the embedded font program is not consistent with the Widths entry of the font dictionary
